title: Zanab247
author: Zanab247
content: I was sharing my testimony with some of my neighbors last two weeks, that thought BTC will not cross 14 years before it will disappear like other cryptocurrencies and it has crossed 14 years and some months now. BTC be the first cryptocurrency I have started my journey with in the community, it has helped me to seen wonders around me, feel greatness around my believe and it will live forever to fulfill purpose in the world. I received text message from my neighbors this morning, that they have seen many reasons why BTC will live forever and they want to be part of the decentralized currency in this period since they have some huge amount of money they are not using now than to invest them in BTC till it will cross to 20 year old before they can sell to share their own testimony. I believe many people here also have testimony to share about their BTC journey and how people try to discourage them but they still go ahead to embrace BTC. For what you have seen so far in BTC, do you think it will live forever? and if it live forever will you be part of those who will love to share the good news to people? You opinion is highly welcome.

comments.author: pawanjain
comments.body: Quote from: Zanab247 on August 07, 2023, 02:28:56 PMdo you think it will live forever?No.Nothing lasts forever and everything has an end. Bitcoin is here, which is good but I don't think it will stay forever.It will surely stay for a long time but at some point of time it will seize to exist.Don't worry though because we all will be dead by that time. We can say that bitcoin will live at least until we live.

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: It will be great if we have a troll account that calls out some of this ridiculous stories about how their neighbors asked this or that about Bitcoin. Even greater if they can do it in a very witty way.

comments.author: notocactus
comments.body: Quote from: Zanab247 on August 07, 2023, 02:28:56 PMI received text message from my neighbors this morning, that they have seen many reasons why BTC will live foreverI love Bitcoin but I hate to see anyone is too optimistic about it and don't see any risk with it. This will cause something naiveky and bad decisions like bet all money in Bitcoin.Risk is risk and it will not disappear just because we think there is no risk.The bullish case for BitcoinQuoteAnd they want to be part of the decentralized currency in this period since they have some huge amount of money they are not using now than to invest them in BTC till it will cross to 20 year old before they can sell to share their own testimony.They are teenagers, aren't they?How do they have huge amount of money when they are teenagers?Sounds very unlogic.QuoteFor what you have seen so far in BTC, do you think it will live forever?Bitcoin will be here, forever.The matter is will its network continue running in future. If its network stops running, your bitcoin will stuck in your wallets, forever.

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Quote from: Zanab247 on August 07, 2023, 02:28:56 PMBTC be the first cryptocurrency I have started my journey with in the community, it has helped me to seen wonders around me, feel greatness around my believe and it will live forever to fulfill purpose in the world. I received text message from my neighbors this morning, that they have seen many reasons why BTC will live forever...Whatever that expression of yours means, I honestly don't know about Bitcoin lasting forever. Though I know it has come to stay. I know this from the evidence that Bitcoin is the bedrock of this industry. Whatever makes Bitcoin disappear will kill the entire industry. It's going to be tsunamic. But that isn't stamping it that it will last forever. Nothing on planet earth lasts forever.Quote from: Upgrade00 on August 07, 2023, 02:43:24 PMIt will be great if we have a troll account that calls out some of this ridiculous stories about how their neighbors asked this or that about Bitcoin. Even greater if they can do it in a very witty way.ðŸ˜†, honestly some of these stories are as ludicrous as they come. Anyway, why a troll account to do that? A regular account can still point out any shenanigan if spotted. Though I must confess that some of them do sound convincing. This also could pass as someone else's reality. It isn't that bogus it can't pass that test remotely.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: Upgrade00 on August 07, 2023, 02:43:24 PMIt will be great if we have a troll account that calls out some of this ridiculous stories about how their neighbors asked this or that about Bitcoin. Even greater if they can do it in a very witty way.Well the fact is that most of these situations are triggered by old members of the forum who introduce the newbies because I believe there is a misconception in the understanding of many as regards to bitcoin and the forum,Â  this is because most of them believe is so much fallacies instead of concentrating on the technicalities and realities with Bitcoin. I wonder why they all take these made-up stories seriously as appealing to the forum members to gain favour or qualify for future favours as against the real discussion which is bitcoin and its fundamental role in our financial life,Â  I bet also that some of these newbies are mistaken bitcoin to be a crowdfunding thing, that needs to be promoted,Â  which is not what it is,Â  so no need for makeup stories let newbies face the reality of time.

comments.author: Dzwaafu11
comments.body: Quote from: Zanab247 on August 07, 2023, 02:28:56 PMFor what you have seen so far in BTC, do you think it will live forever? and if it live forever will you be part of those who will love to share the good news to people? You opinion is highly welcome.mate, nothing endures forever. ... nobody can assert, as you did here, that anything like Bitcoin will endure indefinitely. Are you going to believe someone if they come to you and tell you what will happen to you or someone else tomorrow? No, I understand that you consider what that individual said to you to be significant since you think he didn't know what the future held. Therefore, the answer to the question you were hoping someone would answer is still true today: nobody can predict what will happen to bitcoin in the future. We can only conclude that bitcoin existed even before we were made aware of it, and we remain optimistic that it will do so in the future.But it's best to just state that bitcoin is here to stay. The claim that we simply made that prediction would not be accurate. It may seem that we are skirting the issue, but that is not the case.

comments.author: cabron
comments.body: As long as there are people using it, BTC will live forever. The price however is not going to allow regular people to use it. When one day the price hits $100K, it might just be too much. Even today people are already looking for alternatives like Shib or Doge just to make sure they still have an investment.The people who have been in crypto for years sure have shared already what Bitcoin can do to them and their relatives if they are going to invest. Every person I have told about Bitcoin and have invest are telling their friends like they are the first to have discovered it actually.

comments.author: serjent05
comments.body: Quote from: Zanab247 on August 07, 2023, 02:28:56 PMFor what you have seen so far in BTC, do you think it will live forever? and if it live forever will you be part of those who will love to share the good news to people? You opinion is highly welcome.Bitcoin will stay for a long time, it maybe last for a lifetime but I do not think that it will live forever.Â  Remember technology is in ever development.Â  It continues to upgrade and change, and new discoveries and creation often make the existing become obsolete and replaces it.Â  It is too naive to think that in the advancement of financial technology, Bitcoin will last forever.Â  I believe that in a certain point of time in the future, some more advanced creations will make Bitcoin technology obsolete.

comments.author: romero121
comments.body: Just understand what is happening around. Everything is on a cyclic process, and the financial system too falls in that. There is no exception in it. We can't be sure of it living forever, what we can say is it'll stand for longer time period. From bar tender system to the present cryptocurrencies usage have taken place as a result of technology advancement. On that note, when technology goes better than the prevailing one something better will be attractive and effective. People could move towards it.

comments.author: AmoreJaz
comments.body: Quote from: serjent05 on August 07, 2023, 04:59:48 PMQuote from: Zanab247 on August 07, 2023, 02:28:56 PMFor what you have seen so far in BTC, do you think it will live forever? and if it live forever will you be part of those who will love to share the good news to people? You opinion is highly welcome.Bitcoin will stay for a long time, it maybe last for a lifetime but I do not think that it will live forever. Â Remember technology is in ever development. Â It continues to upgrade and change, and new discoveries and creation often make the existing become obsolete and replaces it. Â It is too naive to think that in the advancement of financial technology, Bitcoin will last forever. Â I believe that in a certain point of time in the future, some more advanced creations will make Bitcoin technology obsolete.remember, nothing lives forever, but yes, btc or crypto may last a lifetime. but this will remain a prediction as we don't know the future of this market. we can always speculate on what will happen down the road, 10 or 20 years from now, but we can't be so sure of what will happen next. we can have our best guess though so we know what we can do before such situation happens. however, for the OP, don't make any promises to your people because you can never give a 100% guarantee that this market will continuously increase thru the years. just be conservative with your expectations and let them know the risks they are taking in also.

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: Quote from: Upgrade00 on August 07, 2023, 02:43:24 PMIt will be great if we have a troll account that calls out some of this ridiculous stories about how their neighbors asked this or that about Bitcoin. Even greater if they can do it in a very witty way.Sad to say but stories of such are spreading and becoming more. Well, there's nothing really wrong with it but ofcourse it would be better if they'd show proofs in line with the story they are telling which would make it more reliable. Purpose? Anyone could create a good story but not all could create a meaningful one not only something filled with bias. Such thingÂ  creates unrealistic impression towards this industry. They are indeed knowing its benefit but it should not be benefit alone. Many people are still getting up of their assumptions because of what they have heard or learned. Ofcourse if things would continue developing in this technology, then that would be the best. But forcing it out will not do us any good.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Quote from: Zanab247 on August 07, 2023, 02:28:56 PMI received text message from my neighbors this morning, that they have seen many reasons why BTC will live forever and they want to be part of the decentralized currencyI think I will be more interested if you also share their reasons why they think or believe that Bitcoin can live forever. You know we keep learning every day, and as different humans, everybody has their own opinion or view about something, so it wouldn't have been bad if you shared their views and why they think so.QuoteFor what you have seen so far in BTC, do you think it will live forever? and if it live forever will you be part of those who will love to share the good news to people? You opinion is highly welcome.I really do want Bitcoin to live for a very long time, like for centuries, but the truth is that there's no guarantee that Bitcoin can live for ever because there's always constant innovation and we can't really tell what will happen in the future. So, there is no guarantee, and I don't know or feel that Bitcoin can live for ever, but it will really be great if it does.

comments.author: uchegod-21
comments.body: Quote from: Zanab247 on August 07, 2023, 02:28:56 PM I see it, I feel it, I know it and it will live forever. What an emotional caption!Everyone explains and believes bitcoin in a way that it affects their personal life. Therr is no doubt that bitcoin has helped so many people, we also need to understand that there are people who did not make fortunes from bitcoin. Â They instead made losses.Commenting on bitcoin lasting forever!The forever phrase doesn't mean eternity, but if bitcoin exists till you die, it has lasted for ever.If bitcoin will be recognised as a currency across the world, it will last forever then because currencies hardly die.

comments.author: bitzizzix
comments.body: Quote from: Zanab247 on August 07, 2023, 02:28:56 PMFor what you have seen so far in BTC, do you think it will live forever? and if it live forever will you be part of those who will love to share the good news to people? You opinion is highly welcome.Nothing lasts forever in this world, but if I may say so, Bitcoin will be more dazzling in the future. And I don't want to think about this and I can only use or enjoy the existence of Bitcoin as long as I am alive.And what you have to realize is that technology continues to develop, so there is a possibility that Bitcoin will be replaced by other technologies that are better than Bitcoin or bitcoin cannot be replaced. And what is certain is that Bitcoin will continue to exist as long as many people use it, but no one knows for sure because no one can predict the future and there is only an uncertain possibility that it will happen.

comments.author: Aanuoluwatofunmi
comments.body: Quote from: Zanab247 on August 07, 2023, 02:28:56 PMI was sharing my testimony with some of my neighbors last two weeks, that thought BTC will not cross 14 years before it will disappear like other cryptocurrencies and it has crossed 14 years and some months now. If you want to know the difference between a fake project and a genuine one, take a look at how consistent they are, the numbers of years they have maintained their reputable success and more other things to put into considerations, no fake project will last this while, the highest they could sustain is few months and through those months will be full of inconsistencies, this is why bitcoin is a currency believed to have come and stay, no fake currency could have lasted this long, fourteen years and still counting.Quote from: Zanab247 on August 07, 2023, 02:28:56 PMFor what you have seen so far in BTC, do you think it will live forever? and if it live forever will you be part of those who will love to share the good news to people?As long as i believe that bitcoin existed and it's reliable for investment and a good store of value, then i adopt bitcoin as a digital currency, i would have developed such confidence in it to have gone this far with my level of being convinced that bitcoin has come to stay, why not tell others to join in adoption when am being benefited, once they can show and developed interest, bitcoin will always be easy for them to learn.

comments.author: synchronym
comments.body: Quote from: Zanab247 on August 07, 2023, 02:28:56 PMI was sharing my testimony with some of my neighbors last two weeks, that thought BTC will not cross 14 years before it will disappear like other cryptocurrencies and it has crossed 14 years and some months now. BTC be the first cryptocurrency I have started my journey with in the community, it has helped me to seen wonders around me, feel greatness around my believe and it will live forever to fulfill purpose in the world. I received text message from my neighbors this morning, that they have seen many reasons why BTC will live forever and they want to be part of the decentralized currency in this period since they have some huge amount of money they are not using now than to invest them in BTC till it will cross to 20 year old before they can sell to share their own testimony. I believe many people here also have testimony to share about their BTC journey and how people try to discourage them but they still go ahead to embrace BTC. For what you have seen so far in BTC, do you think it will live forever? and if it live forever will you be part of those who will love to share the good news to people? You opinion is highly welcome.If we go back 14 years ago today, we will notice that many people were not aware of Bitcoin. But now if you look at this generation, many people are aware of Bitcoin and they have good knowledge about Bitcoin. As op said in his post, Bitcoin has passed about 14 years and few months. So he said that bitcoin will never end or maybe the op meant that the popularity of bitcoin has grown so much or maybe we've been through almost a century so hopefully it won't stop easily so maybe that's what he meant. I would really like Bitcoin to live long and its popularity will increase many folds so that our young generation can have a better understanding of Bitcoin.

comments.author: Emmanuelex
comments.body: Sure, BTC will keep growing and and it is here to stay. I don't even see why anyone would be doubting it by now, it has proven to be a good asset, despite everything that has happened, even when a lot of people thought it was over, it still kept going strong.

comments.author: pooya87
comments.body: Quote from: Zanab247 on August 07, 2023, 02:28:56 PMthat thought BTC will not cross 14 years before it will disappearI'm always curious to know where do people get these types of "prediction" from. The doomsday posts are no longer as common as they once were in the mainstream media so that shouldn't be their reason. I encounter people who don't understand bitcoin or don't know why it exists or if it continues to exist but they don't make the prediction, they just don't know!Quotedo you think it will live forever?Most probably no.I believe Bitcoin was one of the most fantastic inventions of our time but it was the first one that opened the way for more innovation and development. So far we've seen very small number of attempts at improving on the idea with actual innovative projects, I believe this trend will continue and even grow in the future eventually leading to creation of better decentralized cryptocurrencies that could even replace bitcoin some day.I say if we are lucky we can see such a project in about 10 years from now.

comments.author: Zanab247
comments.body: Quote from: Upgrade00It will be great if we have a troll account that calls out some of this ridiculous stories about how their neighbors asked this or that about Bitcoin. Even greater if they can do it in a very witty way.Oh you doubt about my testimony I shared with my neighbors or it's the neighbors that sound strange to you? I think those that grow up from the village or town will understand how neighbors discuss issues between themselves for the progress of the people in that particular compound.
